title: Aleijadinho Candlestick
marks:
Inscription

on bottom of b, incised: [IV]
description: base made up of parts of gilt metal sculptures attached together in a surreal fashion:  human, animal and bird feet, dolphins, horse head, human figures and body parts, key, scrolls, bird\'s head, tiny grate section; top wishbone-shaped element made of white marble with grey veins, with two candle cups
